v-alert/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

v-alert/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-alert/border.description: Adds a colored border to the component.

v-alert/border-color.description: Specifies the color of the border. Accepts any color value.

v-alert/closable.description: Adds a close icon that can hide the alert.

v-alert/close-icon.description: Change the default icon used for **closable** alerts.

v-alert/type.description: Create a specialized alert that uses a contextual color and has a pre-defined icon.

v-alert/close-label.description: Text used for *aria-label* on **closable** alerts. Can also be customized globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization).

v-alert/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component.

v-alert/model-value.description: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.

v-alert/prominent.description: Displays a larger vertically centered icon to draw more attention.

v-alert/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-alert/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-alert/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

v-alert/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

v-alert/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

v-alert/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-alert/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

v-alert/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-alert/location.description: Specifies the component's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

v-alert/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

v-alert/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-alert/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-alert/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-alert/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-alert/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-alert-title/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-app/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-app-bar/image.description: Specifies a [v-img](/components/images) as the component's background.

v-app-bar/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

v-app-bar/collapse.description: Morphs the component into a collapsed state, reducing its maximum width.

v-app-bar/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-app-bar/location.description: Aligns the component towards the top or bottom.

v-app-bar/absolute.description: Applies position: absolute to the component.

v-app-bar/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-app-bar/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-app-bar/extended.description: Use this prop to increase the height of the toolbar _without_ using the `extension` slot for adding content. May be used in conjunction with the **extension-height** prop, and any of the other props that affect the height of the toolbar, e.g. **prominent**, **dense**, etc., **WITH THE EXCEPTION** of **height**.

v-app-bar/extension-height.description: Designate an explicit height for the `extension` slot.

v-app-bar/height.description: Designates a specific height for the toolbar. Overrides the heights imposed by other props, e.g. **prominent**, **dense**, **extended**, etc.

v-app-bar/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-app-bar/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-app-bar/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-app-bar/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-app-bar/name.description: Assign a specific name for layout registration.

v-app-bar/order.description: Adjust the order of the component in relation to its registration order.

v-app-bar/scroll-target.description: The element to target for scrolling events. Uses `window` by default.

v-app-bar/scroll-threshold.description: The amount of scroll distance down before **scroll-behavior** activates.

v-app-bar/scroll-behavior.description: Specify an action to take when the scroll position of **scroll-target** reaches **scroll-threshold**. Accepts any combination of hide, inverted, collapse, elevate, and fade-image. Multiple values can be used, separated by a space.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/symbol.description: The [Symbol](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Symbol) used to hook into group functionality for components like [v-btn-toggle](/components/btn-toggle) and [v-bottom-navigation](/components/bottom-navigations/).

v-app-bar-nav-icon/flat.description: Removes the button box shadow. This is different than using the 'flat' variant.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/prepend-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/block.description: Expands the button to 100% of available space.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/stacked.description: Displays the button as a flex-column.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/value.description: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-app-bar-nav-icon/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/location.description: Specifies the component's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-app-bar-nav-icon/href.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the **href** attribute.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/replace.description: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record. You can find more information about the [replace](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#replace) prop on the vue-router documentation.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/exact.description: Exactly match the link. Without this, '/' will match every route. You can find more information about the [**exact** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#exact) on the vue-router documentation.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/to.description: Denotes the target route of the link. You can find more information about the [**to** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#to) on the vue-router documentation.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/size.description: Sets the height and width of the component. Default unit is px. Can also use the following predefined sizes: **x-small**, **small**, **default**, **large**, and **x-large**.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-app-bar-nav-icon/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-app-bar-nav-icon/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component. The button will become _round_.

v-app-bar-title/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-app-bar-title/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-autocomplete/label.description: Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.

v-autocomplete/auto-select-first.description: When searching, will always highlight the first option and select it on blur. `exact` will only highlight and select exact matches.

v-autocomplete/search.description: Text input used to filter items.

v-autocomplete/filter-mode.description:
Controls how the results of `customFilter` and `customKeyFilter` are combined. All modes only apply `customFilter` to columns not specified in `customKeyFilter`.

- **some**: There is at least one match from either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **every**: All columns match either the custom filter or the custom key filter.
- **union**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, or all columns match the custom key filters.
- **intersection**: There is at least one match from the custom filter, and all columns match the custom key filters.

v-autocomplete/no-filter.description: Do not apply filtering when searching. Useful when data is being filtered server side.

v-autocomplete/custom-filter.description: Function used to filter items, called for each filterable key on each item in the list. The first argument is the filterable value from the item, the second is the search term, and the third is the internal item object. The function should return true if the item should be included in the filtered list, or the index of the match in the value if it should be included with the result highlighted.

v-autocomplete/flat.description: Removes box shadow when using a variant with elevation.

v-autocomplete/custom-key-filter.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. `customFilter` is skipped for columns with `customKeyFilter` specified.

v-autocomplete/filter-keys.description: Array of specific keys to filter on the item.

v-autocomplete/chips.description: Changes display of selections to chips.

v-autocomplete/closable-chips.description: Enables the [closable](/api/v-chip/#props-closable) prop on all [v-chip](/components/chips/) components.

v-autocomplete/close-text.description: Text set to to the inputs `aria-label` and `title` when input menu is closed.

v-autocomplete/open-text.description: Text set to to the inputs **aria-label** and **title** when input menu is open.

v-autocomplete/eager.description: Forces the component's content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.

v-autocomplete/hide-no-data.description: Hides the menu when there are no options to show.  Useful for preventing the menu from opening before results are fetched asynchronously.  Also has the effect of opening the menu when the `items` array changes if not already open.

v-autocomplete/hide-selected.description: Do not display in the select menu items that are already selected.

v-autocomplete/menu.description: Renders with the menu open by default.

v-autocomplete/menu-props.description: Pass props through to the `v-menu` component. Accepts an object with anything from [v-menu](/api/v-menu/#props) props, camelCase keys are recommended.

v-autocomplete/id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.

v-autocomplete/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the input.

v-autocomplete/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-autocomplete/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-autocomplete/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

v-autocomplete/multiple.description: Changes select to multiple. Accepts array for value.

v-autocomplete/no-data-text.description: Text shown when no items are provided to the component.

v-autocomplete/open-on-clear.description: Open's the menu whenever the clear icon is clicked.

v-autocomplete/items.description: Can be an array of objects or strings. By default objects should have **title** and **value** properties, and can optionally have a **props** property containing any [VListItem props](/api/v-list-item/#props). Keys to use for these can be changed with the **item-title**, **item-value**, and **item-props** props.

v-autocomplete/item-title.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its title.

v-autocomplete/item-value.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its value.

v-autocomplete/item-children.description: Property on supplied `items` that contains its children.

v-autocomplete/item-props.description: Props object that will be applied to each item component. `true` will treat the original object as raw props and pass it directly to the component.

v-autocomplete/return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with **item-value**.

v-autocomplete/value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.

v-autocomplete/counter.description: Creates counter for input length; if no number is specified, it defaults to 25. Does not apply any validation.

v-autocomplete/persistent-placeholder.description: Forces placeholder to always be visible.

v-autocomplete/persistent-counter.description: Forces counter to always be visible.

v-autocomplete/role.description: The role attribute applied to the input.

v-autocomplete/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-autocomplete/center-affix.description: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.

v-autocomplete/prepend-icon.description: Prepends an icon to the outnside the component's input, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`.

v-autocomplete/hide-spin-buttons.description: Hides spin buttons on the input when type is set to `number`.

v-autocomplete/hint.description: Displays hint text below the input when focused. Force this always open with the [persistent-hint](#props-persistent-hint) property.

v-autocomplete/messages.description: Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.

v-autocomplete/direction.description: Changes the direction of the input.

v-autocomplete/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-autocomplete/error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.

v-autocomplete/error-messages.description: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.

v-autocomplete/max-errors.description: Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.

v-autocomplete/rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.

v-autocomplete/validate-on.type:
| 'lazy'
  | 'blur'
  | 'input'
  | 'submit'
  | 'blur lazy'
  | 'input lazy'
  | 'submit lazy'
  | 'lazy blur'
  | 'lazy input'
  | 'lazy submit'
v-autocomplete/validate-on.description: Change what type of event triggers validation to run.

v-autocomplete/focused.description: Forces a focused state styling on the component.

v-autocomplete/hide-details.description: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to `auto` messages will be rendered only if there's a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.

v-autocomplete/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-autocomplete/clearable.description: Allows for the component to be cleared.

v-autocomplete/clear-icon.description: The icon used when the **clearable** prop is set to true.

v-autocomplete/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

v-autocomplete/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-autocomplete/base-color.description: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.

v-autocomplete/persistent-clear.description: Always show the clearable icon when the input is dirty (By default it only shows on hover).

v-autocomplete/prepend-inner-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend-inner** slot.

v-autocomplete/single-line.description: Label does not move on focus/dirty.

v-autocomplete/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-autocomplete/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

v-autocomplete/rounded.description: Adds a border radius to the input.

v-autocomplete/counter-value.description: Function returns the counter display text.

v-avatar/start.description: Applies margin at the end of the component.

v-avatar/end.description: Applies margin at the start of the component.

v-avatar/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component.

v-avatar/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-avatar/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-avatar/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-avatar/size.description: Sets the height and width of the component. Default unit is px. Can also use the following predefined sizes: **x-small**, **small**, **default**, **large**, and **x-large**.

v-avatar/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-avatar/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-avatar/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-avatar/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-badge/bordered.description: Applies a **2px** by default and **1.5px** border around the badge when using the **dot** property.

v-badge/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-badge/content.description: Text content to show in the badge.

v-badge/dot.description: Reduce the size of the badge and hide its contents.

v-badge/floating.description: Elevates the badge above the slotted content.

v-badge/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component.

v-badge/inline.description: Moves the badge to be inline with the wrapping element. Supports the usage of the **left** prop.

v-badge/max.description: Sets the maximum number allowed when using the **content** prop with a `number` like value. If the content number exceeds the maximum value, a `+` suffix is added.

v-badge/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-badge/offset-x.description: Offset the badge on the x-axis.

v-badge/offset-y.description: Offset the badge on the y-axis.

v-badge/text-color.description: Applies a specified color to the control text - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-badge/location.description: Specifies the component's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

v-badge/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-badge/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-badge/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-badge/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

v-banner/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-banner/avatar.description: Designates a specific src image to pass to the thumbnail.

v-banner/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-banner/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-banner/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component.

v-banner/stacked.description: Forces the banner actions onto a new line. This is not applicable when the banner has `lines="one"`.

v-banner/sticky.description: Applies `position: sticky` to the component with `top: 0`. You can find more information on the [MDN documentation for sticky position](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/position).

v-banner/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-banner/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-banner/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

v-banner/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

v-banner/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

v-banner/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-banner/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

v-banner/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-banner/location.description: Specifies the component's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

v-banner/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

v-banner/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-banner/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-banner/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-banner/lines.description: The amount of visible lines of text before it truncates.

v-banner-actions/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-banner-actions/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-banner-text/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-bottom-navigation/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-bottom-navigation/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-bottom-navigation/grow.description: Force all [v-btn](/components/buttons) children to take up all available horizontal space.

v-bottom-navigation/mode.description: Changes the orientation and active state styling of the component.

v-bottom-navigation/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-bottom-navigation/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

v-bottom-navigation/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-bottom-navigation/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-bottom-navigation/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-bottom-navigation/name.description: Assign a specific name for layout registration.

v-bottom-navigation/order.description: Adjust the order of the component in relation to its registration order.

v-bottom-navigation/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-bottom-navigation/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-bottom-navigation/multiple.description: Allows one to select multiple items.

v-bottom-navigation/max.description: Sets a maximum number of selections that can be made.

v-bottom-navigation/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-bottom-navigation/disabled.description: Puts all children components into a disabled state.

v-bottom-navigation/mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).

v-bottom-navigation/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-bottom-sheet/inset.description: Reduces the sheet content maximum width to 70%.

v-bottom-sheet/retain-focus.description: Tab focus will return to the first child of the dialog by default. Disable this when using external tools that require focus such as TinyMCE or vue-clipboard.

v-bottom-sheet/scrollable.description: When set to true, expects a `v-card` and a `v-card-text` component with a designated height. For more information, check out the [scrollable example](/components/dialogs#scrollable).

v-bottom-sheet/absolute.description: Applies **position: absolute** to the content element.

v-bottom-sheet/close-on-back.description: Closes the overlay content when the browser's back button is pressed or `$router.back()` is called, cancelling the original navigation. `persistent` overlays will cancel navigation and animate as if they were clicked outside instead of closing.

v-bottom-sheet/contained.description: Limits the size of the component and scrim to its offset parent. Implies `absolute` and `attach`. (Note: The parent element must have position: relative.).

v-bottom-sheet/content-class.description: Applies a custom class to the detached element. This is useful because the content is moved to the beginning of the `v-app` component (unless the **attach** prop is provided) and is not targetable by classes passed directly on the component.

v-bottom-sheet/content-props.description: Apply custom properties to the content.

v-bottom-sheet/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-bottom-sheet/no-click-animation.description: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of a `v-dialog`'s content when using the **persistent** prop.

v-bottom-sheet/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-bottom-sheet/persistent.description: Clicking outside of the element or pressing **esc** key will not deactivate it.

v-bottom-sheet/scrim.description: Accepts true/false to enable background, and string to define color.

v-bottom-sheet/z-index.description: The z-index used for the component.

v-bottom-sheet/target.description: For locationStrategy="connected", specify an element or array of x,y coordinates that the overlay should position itself relative to. This will be the activator element by default.

v-bottom-sheet/activator-props.description: Apply custom properties to the activator.

v-bottom-sheet/open-on-click.description: Activate the component when the activator is clicked.

v-bottom-sheet/open-on-hover.description: Activate the component when the activator is hovered.

v-bottom-sheet/open-on-focus.description: Activate the component when the activator is focused.

v-bottom-sheet/close-on-content-click.description: Closes component when you click on its content.

v-bottom-sheet/close-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before closing component. Only applies to hover and focus events.

v-bottom-sheet/open-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before opening component. Only applies to hover and focus events.

v-bottom-sheet/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-bottom-sheet/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

v-bottom-sheet/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

v-bottom-sheet/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

v-bottom-sheet/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-bottom-sheet/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

v-bottom-sheet/eager.description: Forces the component's content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.

v-bottom-sheet/location-strategy.description: A function used to specifies how the component should position relative to its activator.

v-bottom-sheet/location.description: Specifies the anchor point for positioning the component, using directional cues to align it either horizontally, vertically, or both..

v-bottom-sheet/origin.description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation [for transition origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).

v-bottom-sheet/offset.description: A single value that offsets content away from the target based upon what side it is on.

v-bottom-sheet/scroll-strategy.description: Strategy used when the component is activate and user scrolls.

v-bottom-sheet/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-bottom-sheet/transition.type:
| { component: Component }
  | string
  | boolean
  | (TransitionProps & { component: Component })
v-bottom-sheet/transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

v-bottom-sheet/attach.description: Specifies which DOM element the overlay content should teleport to. Can be a direct element reference, querySelector string, or `true` to disable teleporting. Uses `body` by default.

v-breadcrumbs/divider.description: Specifies the dividing character between items.

v-breadcrumbs/active-class.description: The class applied to the component when it is in an active state.

v-breadcrumbs/active-color.description: The applied color when the component is in an active state.

v-breadcrumbs/bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control's background. Used on components that also support the **color** prop. - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-breadcrumbs/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-breadcrumbs/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-breadcrumbs/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component.

v-breadcrumbs/items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.

v-breadcrumbs/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-breadcrumbs/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-breadcrumbs/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-breadcrumbs-divider/divider.description: Specifies the dividing character between items.

v-breadcrumbs-item/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

v-breadcrumbs-item/active-class.description: The class applied to the component when it matches the current route. Find more information about the [active-class prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#active-class) on the [vue-router](https://router.vuejs.org/) documentation.

v-breadcrumbs-item/active-color.description: The applied color when the component is in an active state.

v-breadcrumbs-item/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-breadcrumbs-item/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-breadcrumbs-item/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

v-breadcrumbs-item/href.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the **href** attribute.

v-breadcrumbs-item/replace.description: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record. You can find more information about the [replace](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#replace) prop on the vue-router documentation.

v-breadcrumbs-item/exact.description: Exactly match the link. Without this, '/' will match every route. You can find more information about the [**exact** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#exact) on the vue-router documentation.

v-breadcrumbs-item/to.description: Denotes the target route of the link. You can find more information about the [**to** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#to) on the vue-router documentation.

v-breadcrumbs-item/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-btn/symbol.description: The [Symbol](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Symbol) used to hook into group functionality for components like [v-btn-toggle](/components/btn-toggle) and [v-bottom-navigation](/components/bottom-navigations/).

v-btn/flat.description: Removes the button box shadow. This is different than using the 'flat' variant.

v-btn/active.description: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component.

v-btn/prepend-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

v-btn/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-btn/block.description: Expands the button to 100% of available space.

v-btn/stacked.description: Displays the button as a flex-column.

v-btn/value.description: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

v-btn/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-btn/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-btn/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-btn/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

v-btn/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

v-btn/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

v-btn/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-btn/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

v-btn/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-btn/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-btn/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-btn/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

v-btn/location.description: Specifies the component's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

v-btn/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

v-btn/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-btn/href.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the **href** attribute.

v-btn/replace.description: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record. You can find more information about the [replace](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#replace) prop on the vue-router documentation.

v-btn/exact.description: Exactly match the link. Without this, '/' will match every route. You can find more information about the [**exact** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#exact) on the vue-router documentation.

v-btn/to.description: Denotes the target route of the link. You can find more information about the [**to** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#to) on the vue-router documentation.

v-btn/size.description: Sets the height and width of the component. Default unit is px. Can also use the following predefined sizes: **x-small**, **small**, **default**, **large**, and **x-large**.

v-btn/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-btn/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-btn/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-btn/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-btn/icon.description: Apply a specific icon using the [v-icon](/components/icons/) component. The button will become _round_.

v-btn-group/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-btn-group/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-btn-group/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-btn-group/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-btn-group/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-btn-group/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-btn-group/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-btn-toggle/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-btn-toggle/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-btn-toggle/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-btn-toggle/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-btn-toggle/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-btn-toggle/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-btn-toggle/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-btn-toggle/multiple.description: Allows one to select multiple items.

v-btn-toggle/max.description: Sets a maximum number of selections that can be made.

v-btn-toggle/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-btn-toggle/disabled.description: Puts all children components into a disabled state.

v-btn-toggle/mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).

v-card/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

v-card/subtitle.description: Specify a subtitle text for the component.

v-card/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-card/image.description: Apply a specific background image to the component.

v-card/append-avatar.description: Appends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-card/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-card/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-card/hover.description: Applies **4dp** of elevation when hovered (default 2dp). You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-card/link.description: Designates that the component is a link. This is automatic when using the href or to prop.

v-card/prepend-avatar.description: Prepends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

v-card/prepend-icon.description: Prepends a [v-icon](/components/icons/) component to the header.

v-card/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-card/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-card/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

v-card/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

v-card/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

v-card/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-card/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

v-card/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-card/loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component **color** (set by color prop - if it's supported by the component) or the primary color.

v-card/location.description: Specifies the component's location. Can combine by using a space separated string.

v-card/position.description: Sets the position for the component.

v-card/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-card/href.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the **href** attribute.

v-card/replace.description: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record. You can find more information about the [replace](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#replace) prop on the vue-router documentation.

v-card/exact.description: Exactly match the link. Without this, '/' will match every route. You can find more information about the [**exact** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#exact) on the vue-router documentation.

v-card/to.description: Denotes the target route of the link. You can find more information about the [**to** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#to) on the vue-router documentation.

v-card/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-card/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-card/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-card/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-card-item/title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

v-card-item/subtitle.description: Specify a subtitle text for the component.

v-card-item/append-avatar.description: Appends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-card-item/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-card-item/prepend-avatar.description: Prepends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

v-card-item/prepend-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

v-card-item/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-card-subtitle/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-card-text/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-card-title/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-carousel/color.description: Applies a color to the navigation dots - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-carousel/cycle.description: Determines if the carousel should cycle through images.

v-carousel/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-carousel/interval.description: The duration between image cycles. Requires the **cycle** prop.

v-carousel/progress.description: Displays a carousel progress bar. Requires the **cycle** prop and **interval**.

v-carousel/next-icon.description: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the next item.

v-carousel/prev-icon.description: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the previous item.

v-carousel/touch.description: Provide a custom **left** and **right** function when swiped left or right.

v-carousel/direction.description: The transition direction when changing windows.

v-carousel/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-carousel/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-carousel/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-carousel/mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).

v-carousel/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-carousel/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-carousel-item/alt.description: Alternate text for screen readers. Leave empty for decorative images.

v-carousel-item/cover.description: Resizes the background image to cover the entire container.

v-carousel-item/draggable.description: Controls the `draggable` behavior of the image. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/draggable).

v-carousel-item/eager.description: Forces the component's content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.

v-carousel-item/gradient.description: The gradient to apply to the image. This can be any valid CSS gradient declaration. You can find more information on the [MDN documentation for gradients](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/gradient).

v-carousel-item/lazy-src.description:
Something to show while waiting for the main image to load, typically a small base64-encoded thumbnail. Has a slight blur filter applied.

Use [vuetify-loader](https://github.com/vuetifyjs/vuetify-loader) to generate automatically. NOTE: This prop has no effect unless either `height` or `aspect-ratio` are provided.

v-carousel-item/options.description: Options that are passed to the [Intersection observer](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API) constructor.

v-carousel-item/src.type:
| string
  | { src: string; srcset: string; lazySrc: string; aspect: number }
v-carousel-item/src.description: The image URL. This prop is mandatory.

v-carousel-item/srcset.description: A set of alternate images to use based on device size. [Read more...](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#attr-srcset).

v-carousel-item/position.description: Applies [object-position](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/object-position) styles to the image and placeholder elements.

v-carousel-item/aspect-ratio.description: Calculated as `width/height`, so for a 1920x1080px image this will be `1.7778`. Will be calculated automatically if omitted.

v-carousel-item/content-class.description: Apply a custom class to the internal content element.

v-carousel-item/inline.description: Display as an inline element instead of a block, also disables flex-grow.

v-carousel-item/height.description: Sets the height for the component.

v-carousel-item/max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

v-carousel-item/max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

v-carousel-item/min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

v-carousel-item/min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-carousel-item/width.description: Sets the width for the component.

v-carousel-item/transition.description: The transition to use when switching from `lazy-src` to `src`. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.

v-carousel-item/crossorigin.description: Specify that images should be fetched with CORS enabled [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#crossorigin)

v-carousel-item/referrerpolicy.description: Define which referrer is sent when fetching the resource [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#referrerpolicy)

v-carousel-item/value.description: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

v-carousel-item/disabled.description: Prevents the item from becoming active when using the "next" and "prev" buttons or the `toggle` method.

v-carousel-item/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-checkbox/label.description: Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.

v-checkbox/id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.

v-checkbox/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-checkbox/center-affix.description: Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.

v-checkbox/type.description: Provides the default type for children selection controls.

v-checkbox/prepend-icon.description: Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`.

v-checkbox/hide-spin-buttons.description: Hides spin buttons on the input when type is set to `number`.

v-checkbox/hint.description: Displays hint text below the input when focused. Force this always open with the [persistent-hint](#props-persistent-hint) property.

v-checkbox/messages.description: Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.

v-checkbox/direction.description: Changes the direction of the input.

v-checkbox/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-checkbox/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-checkbox/error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.

v-checkbox/error-messages.description: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.

v-checkbox/max-errors.description: Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.

v-checkbox/rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.

v-checkbox/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-checkbox/validate-on.type:
| 'input'
  | 'blur'
  | 'submit'
  | 'input lazy'
  | 'blur lazy'
  | 'submit lazy'
  | 'lazy input'
  | 'lazy blur'
  | 'lazy submit'
  | 'lazy'
v-checkbox/validate-on.description: Change what type of event triggers validation to run.

v-checkbox/validation-value.description: The value used when applying validation rules.

v-checkbox/focused.description: Forces a focused state styling on the component.

v-checkbox/hide-details.description: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to `auto` messages will be rendered only if there's a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.

v-checkbox/indeterminate.description: Sets an indeterminate state for the checkbox.

v-checkbox/indeterminate-icon.description: The icon used when in an indeterminate state.

v-checkbox/value.description: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

v-checkbox/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-checkbox/defaults-target.description: The target component to provide defaults values for.

v-checkbox/multiple.description: Changes expected model to an array.

v-checkbox/value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.

v-checkbox/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-checkbox-btn/label.description: Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.

v-checkbox-btn/indeterminate.description: Puts the control in an indeterminate state. Used with the [indeterminate-icon](#props-indeterminate-icon) property.

v-checkbox-btn/indeterminate-icon.description: Icon used when the component is in an indeterminate state.

v-checkbox-btn/type.description: Provides the default type for children selection controls.

v-checkbox-btn/value.description: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

v-checkbox-btn/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-checkbox-btn/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-checkbox-btn/defaults-target.description: The target component to provide defaults values for.

v-checkbox-btn/error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.

v-checkbox-btn/id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.

v-checkbox-btn/inline.description: Puts children inputs into a row.

v-checkbox-btn/multiple.description: Changes select to multiple. Accepts array for value.

v-checkbox-btn/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-checkbox-btn/value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.

v-checkbox-btn/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-checkbox-btn/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-chip/label.description: Applies a medium size border radius.

v-chip/filter.description: Displays a selection icon when selected.

v-chip/active-class.description: The class applied to the component when it matches the current route. Find more information about the [active-class prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#active-class) on the [vue-router](https://router.vuejs.org/) documentation.

v-chip/append-avatar.description: Appends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-chip/append-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.

v-chip/closable.description: Adds remove button and then a chip can be closed.

v-chip/close-icon.description: Change the default icon used for **close** chips.

v-chip/close-label.description: Text used for *aria-label* on the close button in **close** chips. Can also be customized globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization).

v-chip/filter-icon.description: Change the default icon used for **filter** chips.

v-chip/link.description: Designates that the component is a link. This is automatic when using the href or to prop.

v-chip/prepend-avatar.description: Prepends a [v-avatar](/components/avatars/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

v-chip/prepend-icon.description: Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component in the **prepend** slot before default content.

v-chip/value.description: The value used when a child of a [v-chip-group](/components/chip-groups).

v-chip/text.description: Specify content text for the component.

v-chip/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-chip/density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

v-chip/elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

v-chip/disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.

v-chip/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-chip/rounded.description: Designates the **border-radius** applied to the component. You can find more information on the [Border Radius page](/styles/border-radius).

v-chip/href.description: Designates the component as anchor and applies the **href** attribute.

v-chip/replace.description: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record. You can find more information about the [replace](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#replace) prop on the vue-router documentation.

v-chip/exact.description: Exactly match the link. Without this, '/' will match every route. You can find more information about the [**exact** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#exact) on the vue-router documentation.

v-chip/to.description: Denotes the target route of the link. You can find more information about the [**to** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#to) on the vue-router documentation.

v-chip/size.description: Sets the height and width of the component. Default unit is px. Can also use the following predefined sizes: **x-small**, **small**, **default**, **large**, and **x-large**.

v-chip/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-chip/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-chip/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-chip/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.

v-chip-group/column.description: Remove horizontal pagination and wrap items as needed.

v-chip-group/filter.description: Applies an checkmark icon in front of every chip for using it like a filter.

v-chip-group/value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.

v-chip-group/model-value.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.

v-chip-group/multiple.description: Allows one to select multiple items.

v-chip-group/max.description: Sets a maximum number of selections that can be made.

v-chip-group/selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.

v-chip-group/disabled.description: Puts all children components into a disabled state.

v-chip-group/mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).

v-chip-group/tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

v-chip-group/theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.

v-chip-group/color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).

v-chip-group/variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.
